q: Eric Schmidt moving into the executive chairman role.). Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg sought out Sheryl Sandberg . It's a tried and true part of a start-up's growth path, but it's no simple task. How do we make sure we preserve the culture and all the wonderful insights and talents that our founding team members were able to inject, while making sure we have a management bench that will maximize our chances of success? asks Phil Dur, managing director at Investor Growth Capital, an expansion-stage venture firm. ''I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment, Colin Powell said, ''which I think is the major problem facing America right now.'' Andy Coulson , the former editor of the News of the World, stood down after a series of new revelations about illegal phone-hacking during his time at the tabloid. The Prime Minister's spokesman said: He had finished what he wanted to finish and good progress is being made with his replacement. ''It was his choice to leave quietly but he said a proper goodbye to the prime minister and those he worked closely with. Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 when its royal editor, Clive Goodman , was jailed for conspiracy to access phone messages. Klaus Schwab said he doesn't think it will. ''I'm absolutely sure that the euro will not collapse because I think there is still a strong European solidarity in place,'' he told AP. Europe, in this new world that is coming up, if it wants to become a key actor and stay a key actor it has to express itself in terms of its unity and it has to make sure that euro is also secured by a much greater common effort, working together in fiscal monetary and general economic policies. been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. ''Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up,'' Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
